author: makortel
body:
The phase1 workflow prints

```
%MSG-e SiPixelTemplateDBObject: DuplicateTrackMerger:duplicateTrackCandidates
Template ID for DetID 303042564 is not stored
%MSG 
```

many times. The fix is to use `WithTrackAngle` TTRHBuilder for these modules too for now.

Tested in 8_0_0_pre2, no changes expected in run2, but there can be minuscule changes in phase1.

@rovere @VinInn @boudoul
title: Use WithTrackAngle TTRHBuilder for bunch of producers in Phase1
